name: ESB
description: Tr√∂egs E.S.B. "extra special bitter" is dry hopped in the old world traditions. It has a full bodied caramel malt flavor an spicy hop aroma.   A generous amount of Golding hops are added before fermentation to impart a pleasant "bouquet nose" and balanced with pronounced caramel malts to create a complex, malty, aromatic amber ale.
